for such a cushion shoe it does offer

of Versatility for daily training it's

and you do get more of that if you

that kind of thing it's still not a

fly which is a plate and just you know a

certainly of these three shoes is the

it probably Compares best to lightweight

four easy runs long runs the kind of

you've got quite a similar ride to the

of shoe just with kind of better

Under Foot you've got a bouncier design
for sure this is the bounciest Pegasus
for sure you've got a really much more

cuz you've got much higher stack there
so you get more comfort with the Pegasus
premium under the 4 foot and a lot more
response as well like it does give you a

two you do get you know a lot more lift
off that 4 foot but the trade-off is
that it's a lot heavier this shoe and
that's noticeable as well like I have
done some faster running in the Pegasus
premium and it just feels more natural
to do it in something like the Pegasus
plus because it's just a lighter shoe it
just feels easier to up the pace in this
like when you get into a nice flat

you can really bounce along and cruise

but the weight certainly holds it back
and I don't think it's necessarily uh

because it's also I think the least

height of them but it's also got the

which I think is quite a strange design
uh Choice from Nike given that you've

like I'm a neutral Runner and I still
found you know I was pronating a little

and I think if you are someone who needs

the Pegasus premium of these three shoes
the Pegasus 41 is certainly the most
stable so it's definitely the most
interesting ride of the three and it's

because even though it still has that 10
mm drop it does feel a bit more rocket
and you transition a bit more smoothly
in the Pegasus premium I'd say and

shoes which like I say often because of

the 4 foot compared to lots of more

Pegasus premium you know has that extra

feeling there gives you a more
protective feeling on long runs but yeah

think if you're a newer Runner or you're

I'd recommend buying purely from a

stability if you also just want the

running yeah just got those concerns
